Open with YouTube

Help
Help
Watch Later needs your permission to access the accounts configured on your device, so that it can access your YouTube account without knowing your password.

Watch Later is an alternative app to open YouTube links with. Opening a link places it automatically in your watchlater list. If the YouTube app is your default app for opening youtube links, this cannot work. You probably want to choose each time between opening with Watch Later and opening with YouTube. Try out your settings right now by pressing the \"Example\" button below!
Example
YouTube settings
Could not open settings for YouTube. Sorry.
Watch Later settings
Could not open settings for the Watch Later application. Sorry.
Application settings
Could not open your application settings. Sorry.
You should adjust the \"Open by default\" settings for both YouTube and Watch Later. Clear the defaults so that they are not set as default.
Your configuration is fine, everything should work!
Your defaults settings for Watch Later are fine. The YouTube app seems to be missing. You should make sure that it is installed.
Your defaults settings for YouTube are fine. Something seems to be wrong with the defaults settings for Watch Later, or maybe some other app for displaying YouTube content.
Something seems to be wrong with the defaults settings for Watch Later and YouTube, or maybe some other app for displaying YouTube content.
You should adjust the \"Open by default\" settings for the YouTube app. Clear the defaults so that it is not set as default.
You should adjust the \"Open by default\" settings for the Watch Later app. Clear the defaults so that it is not set as default.
You should adjust the \"Open by default\" settings for the %1$s app. Clear the defaults so that it is not set as default.
The YouTube app is not installed.
